member.name: T:FontAwesome5.WPF.Awesome
member.summary: Provides attached properties to set FontAwesome icons on controls.

member.name: F:FontAwesome5.WPF.Awesome.ContentProperty
member.summary: Identifies the FontAwesome.WPF.Awesome.Content attached dependency property.

member.name: M:FontAwesome5.WPF.Awesome.GetContent(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Gets the content of a ContentControl, expressed as a FontAwesome icon.
member.param: The ContentControl subject of the query

member.name: M:FontAwesome5.WPF.Awesome.SetContent(System.Windows.DependencyObject,FontAwesome5.EFontAwesomeIcon)
member.summary: Sets the content of a ContentControl expressed as a FontAwesome icon. This will cause the content to be redrawn.
member.param: The ContentControl where to set the content
FontAwesome icon to set as content

member.name: T:FontAwesome5.WPF.Converters.ImageSourceConverter
member.summary: Converts a FontAwesomIcon to an ImageSource. Use the ConverterParameter to pass the Brush.

member.summary: Control extensions

member.summary: The key used for storing the spinner Storyboard.

member.summary: Start the spinning animation

member.name: M:FontAwesome5.WPF.Extensions.ControlExtensions.StopSpin``1(``0)
member.summary: Stop the spinning animation

member.summary: Sets the rotation for the control

member.summary: Provides a lightweight control for displaying a FontAwesome icon as text.

member.name: P:FontAwesome5.WPF.FontAwesome.Icon
member.summary: Gets or sets the FontAwesome icon. Changing this property will cause the icon to be redrawn.

member.name: P:FontAwesome5.WPF.FontAwesome.Spin
member.summary: Gets or sets the current spin (angle) animation of the icon.

member.name: P:FontAwesome5.WPF.FontAwesome.SpinDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the duration of the spinning animation (in seconds). This will stop and start the spin animation.

member.name: P:FontAwesome5.WPF.FontAwesome.Rotation
member.summary: Gets or sets the current rotation (angle).

member.name: P:FontAwesome5.WPF.FontAwesome.FlipOrientation
member.summary: Gets or sets the current orientation (horizontal, vertical).
